GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.10.154
GSD.description:
nfc: nxp-nci: Fix potential memory leak in nxp_nci_send()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit 9ae2c9a91ff068f4c3e392f47e8e26a1c9f85ebb, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit dece45855a8b0d1dcf48eb01d0822070ded6a4c8. For more details please see the references link.
